about_the_game:
If you're not careful and no-clip out of reality in wrong areas, you'll end up in the Backrooms, where it's nothing but the stink of moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, and endless background noise of fluorescent lights at maximum hum-buzz, and approximately six hundred million square miles of randomly segmented empty rooms to be trapped in.
God save you if you hear something wandering around nearby, because it sure as hell has heard you…

A first-person psychological and survival-horror experience. You are lost in the Backrooms and you have to find a way to survive in this dangerous universe.
Explore the different levels and find clues, objects, or messages to discover the Backrooms’ secrets.
Escape, fight or try to communicate with the Entities that live here.
Follow the steps of other Explorers, meet them, seek refuge in their hideouts, and refill your inventory to increase your chances of survival.
Will you succeed in coming back to the real world, or will you get lost in the depths of the backrooms?

Main features:
  • Explore the Backrooms
  • Survive their dangers
  • Discover their secrets
  • Meets the Entities and other Explorers

⚠️ THIS IS NOT A GAME! Backrooms exist, and the danger is real. Running this program is your only opportunity to increase your chances of survival. Don’t miss it, wishlist now!

name: Backrooms: Levels of Fear

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or Intel Core i5-2500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon R9 380 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X or Intel Core i7-7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB VRAM, AMD RX 6700 XT or NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

short_description: A first-person psychological and survival-horror experience. You are lost in the Backrooms and you have to find a way to survive in this dangerous universe. Explore the different levels, meet the Entities and other Explorers, and find clues to reveal the Backrooms’ secrets.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
